function.name: HasProperty
function.description: Returns a boolean value representing if the IPublishedContent has a property with the specified alias.

function.name: HasValue
function.description: Returns a boolean value representing if the IPublishedContent property has had a value set.

function.name: IsNull
function.description: Returns a boolean value representing if the IPublishedContent property is Null.

function.name: IsVisible
function.note: This function requires a custom property with the alias umbracoNaviHide to work!

function.name: Site
function.note: In v8 this will be renamed to .Root()

function.name: GetCulture
function.description: Gets the culture that would be used to render the content, within the context of a specified current request.
